description: Transit is an important form of transportation in the Central Puget Sound Region and provides a climate friendly option to driving alone.

The Central Puget Sound had one of the fastest growing transit systems in the US before the Pandemic. Like many regions across the country, transit in the Central Puget Sound region continues to rebound from pandemic lows in 2021.
Commute mode by people of color.

Insights & Analysis

  • Transit usage continues to grow post pandemic.

  • Transit service continues to be restored and was about 85% of 2019 levels in 2024.

  • Recovery of Transit boardings has lagged the recovery of transit service.
